blueprint.description: Installs Multipass (a CLI for quickly launching Ubuntu VMs) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Multipass](https://multipass.run/) makes it so that you can get an instant Ubuntu VM with a single command. Multipass can launch and run virtual machines and configure them with cloud-init like a public cloud. It is a product of [Canonical](https://canonical.com/), the same company that publishes Ubuntu.
blueprint.name: Multipass
blueprint.title: Multipass
